mapper.select: SELECT fm.*, p.*, n.notop_code, no.notop_content FROM fac_manage fm JOIN process p ON fm.proc_code = p.proc_code JOIN fac_notop n ON fm.fac_code = n.fac_code LEFT JOIN not_operator no ON n.notop_code = no.notop_code
SELECT fm.fac_name, fn.* FROM fac_manage fm JOIN fac_notop fn ON fm.fac_code = fn.fac_code order by fn.fac_not_code desc
